snippet: Davis Cup champions Britain were locked at 1-1 with Japan after the opening two singles of their World Group, first-round tie on Friday after Andy Murray gave the hosts the lead....
lead_paragraph: Davis Cup champions Britain were locked at 1-1 with Japan after the opening two singles of their World Group, first-round tie on Friday after Andy Murray gave the hosts the lead.

headline.print_headline: Murray Wins but Japan Level With Davis Cup Holders Britain
headline.main: Murray Wins but Japan Level With Davis Cup Holders Britain
